short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helping you to chug through work and flow through tabs!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TabFlo is a tab handler that allows you to store and access tabs from saved workspaces. The terminal like appearance gives the feeling of home away from home for the tech savvy.

TabFlo will help get rid of all those RAM eating tabs without losing them forever! You can now sort tabs into workspaces and open them whenever you would like. 

TabFlo makes it super easy for you to handle your tabs with all the different commands that are provided. Typing 'help' will show you all the useful commands, as well as some fun ones for when you're bored ;)

PRO TIP:
Add a personal shortcut to open the extension, that will rid you the need of using a mouse! Do this at chrome://extensions --> Keyboard Shortcuts
